articles.title: Facebook owner Meta begins final round of mass layoffs - The Guardian
articles.description: Job cuts are part of plan announced in March to eliminate 10,000 roles, bringing headcount to where it stood mid-2021
articles.content: Meta started carrying out the last batch of a three-part round of layoffs on Wednesday, according to a source familiar with the matter, as part of a plan announced in March to eliminate 10,000 roles.… [+2171 chars]

articles.title: Biden trade curbs on China risk huge damage to US tech sector, says Nvidia chief - The Guardian
articles.description: Jensen Huang says Chinese firms will ‘just build it themselves’ if they cannot buy from US
articles.content:
The US risks causing enormous damage to its tech industry if it continues restrictions on trade with China, according to the chief executive of the chipmaker Nvidia.
